001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer.steps;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.Array;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.SimpleHolder;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.TypedVector;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Vector;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Vectors;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.model.HyperparameterConfigurable;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.LinearCombination;
011import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer.LearningRateConfigurable;
012import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer.UpdateStep;
013import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regularization.ExplicitRegularization;
014import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regularization.Regularizations;
015
016import java.util.Map;
017import java.util.Set;
018import java.util.WeakHashMap;
019
020public class AdaGrad<N extends Number> implements UpdateStep<LinearCombination<N>, N>, LearningRateConfigurable<N>, HyperparameterConfigurable {
021
022    private final Map<LinearCombination<N>, SimpleHolder<TypedVector<N>>> adaptions = new WeakHashMap<>();
023
024    private N learningRate;
025
026    public AdaGrad(N learningRate) {
027        this.learningRate = learningRate;
028    }
029
030    @Override
031    public Vector<N> calculateUpdate(Vector<N> gradients, LinearCombination<N> model, int step, Set<ExplicitRegularization<N>> regularizations) {
032        JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport = model.getNumberTypeSupport();
033
034        SimpleHolder<TypedVector<N>> accumulatedSquaredGradients = this.adaptions.computeIfAbsent(model, k -> SimpleHolder.create());
035        TypedVector<N> g2 = accumulatedSquaredGradients.get();
036
037        Array<N> parameters = model.getParameters();
038        Vector<N> thetas = new TypedVector<>(parameters, true, model.getNumberTypeSupport());
039        TypedVector<N> regularizationGradients = (TypedVector<N>) Regularizations.applyExplicitRegularization(regularizations, thetas, gradients);
040
041        // Accumulate squared gradients
042        TypedVector<N> gradientsSquared = Vectors.squared(regularizationGradients);
043        g2 = g2 == null ? gradientsSquared : g2.add(gradientsSquared);
044        accumulatedSquaredGradients.set(g2);
045
046        // Compute update
047        TypedVector<N> g2Sqrt = Vectors.squareRoot(g2); // element wise sqrt
048        TypedVector<N> denom = g2Sqrt.add(typeSupport.epsilon()); // epsilon is scalar, broadcasts
049
050        return Vectors.divide(regularizationGradients, denom).multiply(model.getNumberTypeSupport().negate(learningRate));
051    }
052
053    @Override
054    public Map<String, Object> getHyperparameters() {
055        return Map.of(HP_LEARNING_RATE, learningRate);
056    }
057
058    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
059    @Override
060    public void setHyperparameter(String name, Object value) {
061        if (HP_LEARNING_RATE.equals(name)) {
062            this.learningRate = (N) value;
063        }
064    }
065
066}
